# START OF INFO 201 PROJECT 
## Downloading Data
```{r}
library(tidyverse)

gdp <- read.csv("data/gdp.csv")
global_education <- read.csv("data/global_education.csv")
```

## Merging Data
```{r}
gdp_global_education <- left_join(gdp, global_education, by = c("Country.Territory" = "Countries.and.areas"))
```
